text: 1 of 18 Full Screen Autoplay Close Skip Ad × Where is the band Hanson now? View Photos Brothers Isaac, Taylor and Zachary are celebrating their 25th anniversary as a musical group. Caption Brothers Isaac, Taylor and Zachary are celebrating their 25th anniversary as a musical group. Isaac, Zac and Taylor Hanson on Main Street in Tulsa ’ s Brady Arts District, where the band is renovating a building to house their studio, brewery and performance space. The famed Cain ’ s Ballroom, once home to Bob Wills and the Texas Playboys, is in the background. Shane Bevel / For The Washington Post Buy Photo Wait 1 second to continue. UPDATED from August 2017 : You can now hear Geoff Edgers ’ s interviews with Hanson in the “ Edge of Fame ” podcast. Look for the “ play ”
